title: 221 - The Ruthless Elimination of Hurry - with John Mark Comer
description:
We are so excited about this week's episode with John Mark Comer in which we discuss his new book about eliminating hurry in our lives. He talks spiritual disciplines, enneagram, and more!

Then, yours truly does an outro in which Bonnie discusses Quantum Mechanics and we toss around a different name for "deconstruction".

Thank you for listening, we can't wait to hear your thoughts!

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - apple.co/1Lla1Nj

Follow Mike on Twitter: www.twitter.com/mikeerre

Music in this episode by Timothy John Stafford
www.timothyjohnstafford.com
Instagram & Twitter: @GoneTimothy
